markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spiritual Explorer](/Feats.aspx?ID=2223) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 40</row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</column>

---

You're familiar with the danger that lingering spirits can pose to an unwary adventurer, and you're particularly attuned to their presence. Even if you aren't [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=519) in exploration mode, you can attempt a check to find [haunts](/Traits.aspx?ID=88) that normally require you to Search for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to find a particular haunt.
name: Spiritual Explorer
